title: All Eyes On Trump As Gun Debate Heats Up
text:
Will President Trump announce support for any gun control measures this week? Has Beto's declaration that "Hell, yes" he's coming for your guns emboldened gun control activists or the Second Amendment community? Stephen Gutowski of the Washington Free Beacon joins Cam to discuss these topics and more.

Plus, an armed citizen story from North Carolina, a young man in Wisconsin who can't seem to catch a prison sentence no matter how many times he ends up in court, and a Detroit officer in the right place at the right time to help a homeless man.
description: Will President Trump announce support for any gun control measures
